entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
